metadata.title: CVE-2022-0794 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in WebShare in Google Chrome prior to 99.0.4844.51 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific user interactionto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
